```{r}
# install.packages("readxl")

library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
cereal <- read_excel("cereal.xlsx")
head(cereal)
```
**Q1**
```{r}
cereal[1:10,]
```

**Q2**
```{r}
Kelloggs <- cereal[cereal$company == "K",]
head(Kelloggs)
```

**Q3**
```{r}
cereal[cereal$sugars > 10, "name"] 
```


**Q4**
```{r}

mean(cereal$calories)

```

**Q5**
```{r}
subset(cereal, fiber >= 2)

```
